name: Five Lapz
description:
A fast top-down retro racing game with 4 circuits, online leaderboards (lap times and race times) and 2 player local battle mode.

Race against 3 CPU pilots and win the current race to unlock the next track. You have 5 laps to try your best. The fastest players will be uploaded to the online leaderboards. Fasten your seat belts and good luck!

Challenge a friend and play locally a 2 player battle mode championship. Who will be the champion?

This game is heavy influenced by the old Spectrum and Amiga top-down racing games like Super Sprint, Skidmarks, Super Cars, Micro Machines, Super Off Road, and so on...

Thanks for playing and have fun :)

You can check the game's main music here: https://barberz.bandcamp.com/releases
